attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we live in a very happy little community just the 8 of us  4 double semis all council one bought most of us have lived here for 20 years pluss bringing up many children between us we have taken pride with our gardens and our homes then one day a short while ago we was each issued a letter from the council saying proposals for the future of all 8   "what future" we all feel devorstated about this letter which tells us that the council has the capital available to redevelop the whole site and this means demolishing our houses.These houses were built just after the war and from our personal building surveys we know they are solid as the day they were built so why not bring them up to spek .We are worried because the people  half a mile down the road who all  have simler houses have  now been forced out and we have decided that were not moving the compensation they have offered is an insult £4,000 we want to stay here

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
